allow: Bash(for file in about.html acupuncture.html chiropractic.html contact.html dietitian.html massage.html orthotics.html osteopathy.html physiotherapy.html psychology.html team.html)

Bash(do sed -i 's/Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM
Sunday: Closed/Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: Closed/g' "$file")
